title: Fears to Fathom – Ironbark Lookout
description:
Fears to Fathom is an episodic psychological horror game where each episode unveils a short story narrated by the ones who survived. You’re browsing the fourth installment of the Fears to Fathom anthology. Jack Nelson, a 24 year old fire lookout, transferred to a new outpost. Hidden Cats in Spooky Town
As he settled into his new home, he couldn’t shake the feeling that something was off, little did he know what was transpiring down in Ironbark State Park. He survived as he made the right choices. This game is primarily a first-person narrative walking simulator with exploration, driving, and conversation mechanics .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
